transcript:
Customer: Hi, if you record your name and reason for calling, I'll see if this person is available.

Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello, hi sir, good morning. Sanjay baat kar raha hun IndiaMART Noida head office se.
Customer: Ji, kya kaam hai IndiaMART se?
Executive: Ji, Aryan Decorators mein baat ho rahi hai na?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Ji, actually sir main aapko isliye kar raha tha, meri backend ki jo team hai, jo aapko profile deti hai na, Durgesh Kumar. Sir, aapki ek call aaya tha sir, incoming, jo ki hum dekh pa rahe hain yahan par jaake. To profile kyunki we manage karte hain, matlab meri team backend pe manage karti hai. Main branch head baat kar raha hun. Kuch query aapko uske regarding, any query, any
Customer: Query yahi hai sir ki leads properly nahi aa rahi hain. Jo hona chahiye kaam, woh nahi hai. Diwali se pehle se yeh problem aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Lekin solve out ho nahi pa raha woh kaam.
Executive: Leads sahi nahi aa rahi aapke andar, kehna chah rahe hain sir?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Aap kisi particular category ki baat kar rahe hain, kar rahe hain sir ya overall baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Main to overall hi baat kar raha hun sir.
Executive: Ek baar line pe rahiye sir, main check kar leta hun. Because main online, aap bhi system ke samne hain kya aap?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, main to phone pe hun filhaal.
Executive: System pe nahi hai.
Customer: Line pe rahiye sir.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap Aryan Gupta sir hi baat kar rahe hain sir? Nahi, mujhe confirm karna chahunga aap.
Executive: Ji, ji.
Executive: Aap mainly yeh jitne bhi tea cups set ho gaya, glass pudding sets ho gaya, isme deal karte hain na? Glass bowls.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Ceramic tea. Sir, jo yeh lead aap consume kar rahe ho filhaal abhi, pehle to sir mujhe iska bata dijiye, taaki maine kyunki sabse pehle yeh khola hua hai. Jo abhi latest leads aapne consume kari hai, inka kya feedback hai? Matlab yeh leads relevant thi, nahi thi sir isme? Jaise ki agar main baat karun
Customer: Hui, baat hui hai. Inko photos bheji hain maine abhi.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, aaj ki, aaj ki baat nahi kar raha hun. Aaj ki to
Customer: Hmm hmm, boliye boliye sir, kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Ek to Rajkot ki thi abhi subah.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ek Pratapgarh ki thi.
Executive: Rohit karke jo buyer the, yeh kahan ke the?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Rohit karke buyer the, Rohit the, Mohammad Shahbaz, Shahdab the, Rohit, Rohit karke ek buyer the.
Customer: Shahdab to wahan ke the, kya naam hai, Pratapgarh ke.
Executive: Achha, kya baat hui? Unko quotation bheji aapne?
Customer: Unko to haan, photo bheje hain maine abhi.
Executive: Achha. Aur ek Balda karke buyer the, Vishwas karke, Balda Vishwas.
Customer: Haan, woh Rajkot ke.
Executive: Inse koi baat hui?
Customer: Rajesh bhai haan the. Unko bhi photos bheje hain maine.
Executive: Achha, inko, matlab aaj ki jo quotation aapne photo bheje hain aapne, yeh kehna chah rahe ho?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur kal aapka iske andar mein working tha ya kya tha matlab? Kal sir main dekh pa raha hun, kal to koi lead consume nahi hui hai. Jabki lead platform pe aapke paas mein aa chuka hai.
Customer: Kal consume nahi hui, kal to Sunday bhi tha na. Main active nahi rehta hun main Sunday ko.
Executive: Sunday nahi tha na, kal to Monday tha sir.
Customer: Matlab Monday off rehta hai kya aap logon ka?
Customer: Kal main bahar tha. Bahar bhi tha, off bhi rehta, lekin main bahar tha sir.
Executive: Aur perसों भी नहीं की होगी।
Customer: Haan, perसों भी नहीं की।
Executive: Sir, actually main dono chart khole hain, maine phone pe utni jaldi aayi hai. Main aap jo keh rahe hain sir, matlab maine apne samne dono chart khole hue hain. Kaun kaun si lead aayi hai, kitni left gayi hai, kya sahi hai nahi hai. Ek baar mujhe kal ka confirm kara dijiye isme, taaki main relevancy check kar paun aapki sabse pehle. To yeh cup gift set ke regarding Aurangabad se aayi hai sir aapke paas lead. Din to karti hain sir iske andar.
Customer: Aaj, aaj
Executive: Yeh aaj hi aayi thi. Mujhe mujhe category mein dikkat nahi hai. Dikkat main kya hai, mere ko usme dikkat hai quantity mein. Quantity koi 20 set maang raha hai, koi 50 set maang raha hai.
Executive: Aap minimum kitni deal karte hain?
Customer: Quantity ho nahi pa raha. Minimum 500 set to ho, kam se kam lakh dedh lakh ka maal ho.
Executive: 500 set ki baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Minimum bata rahe ho.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Ek aur aayi thi sir tea cup ceramic ke Indore, Madhya Pradesh se, 10,000 pieces ki thi yeh. 10 lakh tak ka order tha yeh. Yeh aaj ki lead thi.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Do ghanta pehle aayi thi but I don't know, matlab do ghanta pehle to lead expired dikha rahi hai abhi jaake mujhe. Do ghanta pehle. Agar main aaj ki baat karun, do lead abhi tak aayi hai. Ek to teen to aapne consume kar li. Aur do aur aayi hai, 10,000 pieces ki aayi hai, jo achhi thi mere according jo aap bata rahe ho jo isse. Aur
Customer: Kahan pe aayi hai? Mujhe dikh nahi rahi 10,000 wali.
Executive: Aapke yahan yeh laptop hai aapke paas mein?
Customer: Nahi, laptop abhi nahi hai.
Executive: Laptop use nahi karte? Matlab mobile se hi nahi, abhi, abhi nahi hai. Main bahar hun, abhi nahi hai mere paas.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, main puchh raha hun just generic way mein ki matlab mobile se use karte hain ya laptop bhi hai?
Customer: Main to mobile se use karta hun. Laptop se to yeh hai ki subah shaam khol leta hun.
Executive: Achha achha, kyunki mobile pe to nahi hai. Mobile pe to nahi dikhegi aapko, sold out thi. But yeh do ghanta pehle aayi thi iske andar. Aur kal ka bhi agar main data check kar raha hun sir, aap matlab abhi to aap online hi hai, koi dikkat nahi hai. Kal bhi sir kaafi leads aayi thi jo 500 pieces ki jitna aap bata rahe ho, us range mein thi. Matlab main agar baat karun vacuum glass karke aayi thi ek lead Mumbai se. Theek hai? 10,000 kya kya kis se related aayi?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Vacuum, matlab abhi yeh expired lead hai par jitna main data dekh raha hun ki aa rahi nahi aa rahi sir iske andar. Vacuum glass, vacuum glass mein to nahi karta main.
Customer: Vacuum glass is two cups gift set karke.
Executive: Nahi karta vacuum glass mein.
Executive: Yeh nahi karte iske andar? Gift items mein to karte hi hain. Matlab gifting items ki bhi aayi hai.
Customer: Woh to karta hun, woh to karta hun.
Executive: Yeh 500 pieces ki aayi hai yeh requirement. Jo badi badi main dekh pa raha hun iske andar. Ek aapke paas white ceramic printed tea cup ke regarding aayi hai. Yeh bhi sahi hai. Yeh bhi 500 pieces ki aayi hai. Ek aur aayi hai. Matlab dekhiye main jitna dekh pa raha hun sir, quantity wise bhi lead aa rahi hai aisa nahi hai. Isko aap consume bhi kar rahe hain but kuch left bhi ja rahi hai iske andar aapke profile.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kyunki latest ka do din ka data hi main dekh paunga sir, matlab latest ka hi. Matlab purana chaun to kya matlab uske andar. To mere according sir matlab nahi hai. Do din ka data to yeh show kar raha hai jaise aapne kaam nahi kara. Baki quantity aa rahi hai sir but thoda sa aapko ek kaam jarur karna padega sir iske andar. Yeh sold out kyun ho rahi hai sold out yeh lead?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Iska reason kya hai?
Customer: Main available nahi hounga us time pe, tabhi sold out ho rahi hai.
Executive: Matlab available nahi hai. Matlab us time pe to available nahi hai. Aapke agar paanch supplier isko lead ko click karke use kar lenge, woh jaake woh lead sold out ho jayegi aapke. Thoda sa aapko isme dekh lena hai. Baki main isko under observation dekhta hun. Main bhi dekhta hun sir ek week tak kitni expired hui, kitni aapne consume kari. Hmm. Ek week ke baad mein main dekhunga sir. Expired kitni relevant. Theek hai? Voice break ho rahi hai. Actually judge kar payenge. Theek hai? Hello. Ek cheez last aur bata dijiye sir, yeh glass jug mein deal karte hain?
Customer: Glass jug mein filhaal nahi kar raha hun. Karta to tha lekin abhi woh stock mein nahi hai mere.
Executive: Glass tumbler, glass jug, glass jug mein?
Customer: Glass jug mein nahi karta hun main.
Executive: Glass tumbler mein bhi deal karte hain?
Customer: Glass tumbler mein to karta hun.
Executive: Karte hain na? Aap is category ko negative mark kar rahe ho sir matlab.
Customer: Nahi, glass tumbler ya to woh kitni kya actually kya lead hai? Properly mujhe batao.
Executive: Lead nahi sir, hum na category check karte hain. Kis kis category ko aapne negative mark kara hai. To glass tumbler ko aapne mark kara hai aise. Lemon set ko mark kara hua hai.
Customer: Glass lemon set bhi mark kiya hua hai negative?
Executive: Haan. Agar aapko isko recover karna hai, low order, low order, low order quantity hogi isliye lead mark kiya hoga negative.
Customer: Quantity pe mark kariye sir, aapne na usko product mein mark kar diya hai.
Customer: Galat hua hai. Lemon set to karta hun.
Executive: Galat hua hai. To aapko agar isko recover karna hai dobara, theek hai? To aapko system pe apne settings option mein jana padega. Hmm. Settings option mein sabse upar aata hai business preferences ka page. Theek hai? Hmm. Wahan par click karke sabse niche ek option aata hai non preferred categories. Wahan wahan jo jo categories aapne negative mark kari hai isko aapko restore karna padega aapko wahan se.
Customer: Aap hi kar do apne end se.
Executive: Mere end se nahi hoga sir, client hi kar pata hai woh. Aap logon ko access hai, mere paas access nahi hota hai. Main sirf dikha sakta hun yeh categories mein dekh sakta hun, main kar nahi sakta. Client hi kar payega usko.
Customer: Chalo, main kar lunga aur.
Executive: Bas yahi cheez hai sir. Baki aapki quantity aur leads ko ek baar observe karte hain sir, matlab jitna frequency. But try bas yahi karna sir jitni jo left ho rahi hai iski frequency thoda kam ho jaye iske andar. Theek hai?
Executive: Baki Aryan sir yeh main mera number hai. Agar in case kabhi aapko lagta hai kuch help required hai, theek hai? Main backend se Durgesh 3481 last mein.
Executive: 3481. Branch head baat kar raha hun. Manager. Awaaz aa rahi hai suniye.
Customer: Voice break ho rahi hai. Hello.
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai aapko awaaz?
Customer: Haan, yeh 3481 number hai na aapka last mein?
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji. Sanjay naam hai mera, Sanjay.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Branch head hun. Agar kabhi dikkat aapko directly baat karni hai official hours mein, please call back kar sakte hain. Theek hai, theek hai, okay sir. Baki yeh feedback main aapke process kar raha hun further closure aapka. Okay, okay. Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are not coming properly since Diwali.

- Quantity of leads is not as expected.

- Sold out leads due to unavailability.

- Glass tumbler and lemon set marked negative.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the lead details and provided information.

- Executive explained how to restore categories.

- Executive shared his contact number for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will restore the negative marked categories.

- Executive will observe quantity and leads for a week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, quantity, sold out, categories, negative marking
